    • Uses of Computer.AllocatedCore in fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers

      Methods in fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers that return Computer.AllocatedCore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Computer.AllocatedCore Computer.allocateCore()
      allocate one core on this computer and return an instance of AllocatedCore containing the processor number, the core number and a map giving the URI of the processor inbound ports; return null if no core is available.
      Computer.AllocatedCore[] Computer.allocateCores(int numberRequested)
      allocate up to numberRequested cores on this computer and return and array of AllocatedCore containing the data for each requested core; return an empty array if no core is available.
      Methods in fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers with parameters of type Computer.AllocatedCore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Computer.releaseCore(Computer.AllocatedCore ac)
      releases a priorly reserved core.
      void Computer.releaseCores(Computer.AllocatedCore[] acs)
      release an array of priorly reserved cores.

      Computer.AllocatedCore[] ComputerServicesI.allocateCores(int numberRequested)
